channel.title: [317] Level loading problems[bluuurs]
channel.description: Okay I am using a bluuurs client and I need to make levels load, like when you walk up stairs and was wondering how I do it, I don't want to have to get a new client and recode all the models and customs, this is a big problem because I was going to add custom owner capes and etc. But I can't unless I know there is a way to fix this problem

item.title: [317] Level loading problems[bluuurs]
item.dc:creator: @NoobCoder NoobCoder
item.description:
@NoobCoder wrote:

Okay I am using a bluuurs client and I need to make levels load, like when you walk up stairs and was wondering how I do it, I don’t want to have to get a new client and recode all the models and customs, this is a big problem because I was going to add custom owner capes and etc. But I can’t unless I know there is a way to fix this problem
